error.signature: Error: Provider API rate limit exceeded: Throttling or TooManyRequestsException
error.regex: (rate limit exceeded|Throttling|TooManyRequests|429 Too Many Requests|API rate limit|RequestLimitExceeded)

verdict.summary: Terraform is making too many API calls to the cloud provider, triggering rate limiting.

dead_ends.why_fails: Immediate retries increase the request rate and extend the throttling window

dead_ends.action: Increase parallelism to speed through rate limits
dead_ends.why_fails: Higher parallelism means more concurrent API calls, making rate limiting worse

workarounds.how: terraform apply -parallelism=5 (default is 10) to reduce concurrent API calls

workarounds.action: Wait and retry with exponential backoff, or split into smaller configurations
workarounds.how: Wait a few minutes then retry; for large infrastructure, split into separate state files by service or team

frequently_confused_with.distinction: Provider authentication is about invalid credentials; provider rate limit is about valid credentials exceeding API call quotas
